snippet: Rescuers saved 400 people, though 25 died when the boat overturned, and another hundred were feared to have drowned, Italian officials said.
abstract: Italian officials report capsizing of fishing boat overloaded with migrants off Libyan coast, killing 25 people; rescuers save 400 people but say another hundred may have drowned.
lead_paragraph: Rescuers saved 400 people, though 25 died when the boat overturned, and another hundred were feared to have drowned, Italian officials said.

headline.main: Hundreds of Migrants Rescued After Boat Capsizes Off Libya
headline.print_headline: Crowded Migrant Boat Capsizes Off Libyan Coast

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
